name: Distressed (Sentrial)
description:
WIGGLE THE MOUSE SENSITIVITY IN THE SETTINGS AT THE START OF THE GAME
The kawaii anime girl is doomed to fall into the pit of lava in one hour. Will you save her in time? (~15 min game)
Explore a deep philosophical question in the double ending game.
Would love to receive comments if anyone plays this just to get your thoughts. This game is pretty bad - it's my first time using Unity so i just made some random thing. Hoping to improve and put out something good soon. Try to enjoy the trash of it.
